pyproject_scaffold.body:
[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=42", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[project]
name = "${1:project_name}"
version = "${2:0.1.0}"
description = "${3:Project description here}"
authors = [
    { name = "${4:Author Name}", email = "${5:author@example.com}" }
]
license = { text = "${6:licence}" }
dependencies = [
    ${9:dependencies}
]
requires-python = ">=${7:python_version}"

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
    "black",
    "pylint",
    "isort",
    "pyright",
    "mypy",
    "docformatter"
]

[tool.black]
line-length = ${8:line_length}

[tool.isort]
profile = "black"
line_length = ${8:line_length}

[tool.pylint]
max-line-length = ${8:line_length}

[tool.pyright]
typeCheckingMode = "strict"

[tool.mypy]
python_version = "${7:python_version}"
strict = true
ignore_missing_imports = true
warn_unused_configs = true

[tool.docformatter]
line_length = ${8:line_length}
pre_summary_newline = true
post_summary_newline = true
make_summary_multi_line = false
force_wrap = false
use_double_quotes = true

scaffold_mise_py.body:
[tools]
 python = "3.${1:version_number}" # [optional] will be used for the venv
uv = 'latest'
 [env]
 PROJECT_NAME = "{{ config_root | basename }}"
 _.python.venv = { path = "{{ config_root }}/.venv", create = true }
